summary: Over 5 years of experience in research and development of applications, optimization and unit testing specializing in Python development for internal tools in the VFX industry and Medical/Healthcare domain solutions.

responsibilities: Developed a network-independent review system, Cad Engineer ensuring uninterrupted playback for supervisors through system integration and network file transfer protocols.
Optimized legacy code for improved performance
Integrated an internal performance monitoring system to track service calls and crash reports.
Designed and implemented custom PyQt panels that allow creates to navigate released rendered o/p, provide feedback and enhance RV's native tools to align with production needs.
Established seamless API-based communication between the PMS and AMS, ensuring efficient data retrieval.
Developed media browsing and playlist management panels, allowing users to sort, organize, and showcase media during client reviews.
Handled feature requests and issue resolutions from create teams, ensuring continuous improvements and user satisfaction.
Developed comprehensive test cases to support test-driven development
Engaged in product demonstrations to highlight key features and collect user feedback for improvements
Python packages: VTK, numpy, pandas, OpenCV, jinja2

experience.company: SCAD College of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: ReviewTool
projects.description: This tool helps to enable VFX and Animation studios create SPECTACULAR SHOTS by providing a SOLID PLATFORM to facilitate the most crucial REVIEW-FEEDBACK loop.
